text: the court has adjourned for the day the
prosecution has now indicated that they
don't intend calling any further
witnesses after initially saying that
the world were going to call between
three and four witnesses which also
caused a delay here because initially it
was thought that judgment or sentencing
would be delivered on Friday but because
there were more witnesses that were
called and there were also
cross-examination of those witnesses
that is why we saw a delay here now it
has been now indicated that final
argument between the prosecution and the
defense in mitigation and aggravation of
sentencing will happen first thing
Friday morning but after that the judge
has to consider those arguments before
handing down her judgment so it's likely
that there won't be sentencing happening
tomorrow
